Prebon looked over Attilla, the oposite bot was slightly taller and more ar=
mored than himself, The former Trainer leader always tried to size up a pos=
sible opponent before a fight. "Very well" he said crossing his arms tightl=
y in a peturbed fashion, "Then I will ask Shivah about how I AM to be treat=
ed." His arms went to his sides and he turned towards the door. "If you wou=
ld be so considerate as to introduce us I would be greatfull" He continued =
in mock courtesy making a request sound like an order.
  ----- Original Mes=
sage ----- 
  From: airly2000@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Monday, May 28, 2001 9:13 AM
  Subject: RE: It's Showtime


  Attilla:
=

  "Nope, it isn't the way " answered  Attilla "What do you think if Shivah=
 solve this trouble... He can explain you what happened Ok?"
    ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
    From: CYBERWOLF4 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
 =
   Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 10:46 AM
    Subject: Re: It's Showtime


   =
 Prebon stepped out, his memories were either gone or distorted but his lea=
dership programs were still intact. He remembered how roughly he was treate=
d and how he was slammed into the CR chamber. To top it off he was always c=
ranky when he woke up. "What is the meaning of this travesty?" he yelled. H=
e saw Predacon emblem on Attilla so he knew thought he wasn't a POW. "Is th=
is any way to treat one of the Predacons best training units?" his record o=
f service would have spoke for itself if he hadn't erased it when he left t=
he Predacons to start his own unit.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
   =
   From: airly2000@... 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent:=
 Sunday, May 27, 2001 10:01 PM
      Subject: RE: It's Showtime


      Att=
illa:

      "Memories erased, reprogramation ended"thought Attilla "This g=
uy is ready to start duties."

      Attilla typed some buttons and watied =
to Cr's door 0pen, "Hey, Hello"

      The bot was ready to fight just in c=
ase.
